titleStmt.title: The religious & loyal protestation, of John Gauden Dr. in Divinity; against the present declared purposes and proceedings of the Army and others; about the trying and destroying our soveraign lord the King. Sent to a collonell, to bee presented to the Lord Fairfax, and his Councell of Warre, this fift of January 1648.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: The page after p. 3 is numbered 8.
A2-4 and most of title page in same setting as Wing G367.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
